name: Push-ups
instructions: 1. Get into a plank position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart. 2. Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor. 3. Push yourself back up to the starting position. 4. Keep your core tight throughout the movement.

name: Squats
instructions: 1. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart. 2. Lower your body by bending your knees and pushing your hips back. 3. Keep your chest up and core engaged. 4. Lower until thighs are parallel to the ground. 5. Push through your heels to return to starting position.

name: Pull-ups
instructions: 1. Grab a pull-up bar with an overhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart. 2. Hang with arms fully extended. 3. Pull yourself up until your chin is above the bar. 4. Lower yourself back down with control. 5. Repeat for desired reps.

name: Plank
instructions: 1. Get into a forearm plank position with elbows directly under shoulders. 2. Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels. 3. Engage your core and glutes. 4. Hold this position for the desired time. 5. Don't let your hips sag or pike up.

name: Lunges
instructions: 1. Stand tall with feet hip-width apart. 2. Step forward with one leg. 3. Lower your body until both knees are bent at 90 degrees. 4. Push back to starting position. 5. Alternate legs and repeat.

name: Deadlifts
instructions: 1. Stand with feet hip-width apart, barbell over midfoot. 2. Bend at hips and knees to grip the bar. 3. Keep back straight and chest up. 4. Drive through heels to lift the bar. 5. Stand fully upright, then lower the bar with control.

name: Bench Press
instructions: 1. Lie on a bench with feet flat on the floor. 2. Grip the barbell slightly wider than shoulder-width. 3. Lower the bar to your chest with control. 4. Press the bar back up to starting position. 5. Keep your shoulder blades retracted throughout.

name: Running
instructions: 1. Start with a light warm-up walk. 2. Gradually increase pace to a comfortable run. 3. Maintain good posture with relaxed shoulders. 4. Land on midfoot and push off with toes. 5. Breathe rhythmically and stay hydrated.

name: Burpees
instructions: 1. Start in a standing position. 2. Drop into a squat and place hands on the ground. 3. Jump feet back into a plank position. 4. Do a push-up. 5. Jump feet back to squat position. 6. Jump up with arms overhead.

name: Mountain Climbers
instructions: 1. Start in a high plank position. 2. Bring one knee toward your chest. 3. Quickly switch legs, bringing the other knee in. 4. Continue alternating legs at a running pace. 5. Keep your core engaged and hips level.

name: Bicep Curls
instructions: 1. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, holding dumbbells. 2. Keep elbows close to your body. 3. Curl weights up toward shoulders. 4. Squeeze biceps at the top. 5. Lower weights with control.

name: Tricep Dips
instructions: 1. Position hands shoulder-width apart on a bench or chair. 2. Extend legs out in front of you. 3. Lower your body by bending elbows. 4. Keep elbows pointing back, not flaring out. 5. Push back up to starting position.

name: Shoulder Press
instructions: 1. Stand or sit with dumbbells at shoulder height. 2. Keep core engaged and back straight. 3. Press weights overhead until arms are fully extended. 4. Lower weights back to shoulder height with control. 5. Avoid arching your back.

name: Crunches
instructions: 1. Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat. 2. Place hands behind your head or across chest. 3. Engage your core and lift shoulder blades off the ground. 4. Exhale as you crunch up. 5. Lower back down with control.

name: Jumping Jacks
instructions: 1. Start standing with feet together and arms at sides. 2. Jump feet out wide while raising arms overhead. 3. Jump feet back together while lowering arms. 4. Keep a steady rhythm. 5. Land softly on the balls of your feet.
